data.title: Los metates
data.text: Im glad this place is here. The staff is always friendly and fast. I have been coming for over a year and no complaints.

data.title: Great Little Spot
data.text: This is one of my favorite Taqueria's around. It is a small place with limited seating but the food is great. It's cash only so don't bring a card.

data.title: not everything is scratch prepared
data.text: had a bogo coupon so decided to try this place.  Typical mexican food.  Prices reasonable.  there is a large salsa bar with many fixings to compliment your meal.  The chips were from store bought bags but still tasty.  I've had the warehouse type chips that seem to have been sitting around and are a bit putrid but these were pretty good.  They might have been more than your typical corn chip like maybe whole grain.  Ordered the lunch plate (even though it was 6 PM I could still get this) and a chile relleno plate.  The lunch plate was simple: beans(refried), rice, lettuce, guacamole,plus choice of meat (I had chicken).  The meat was ample and cut into small pieces.  Came with about 10 small (about 5") tortilla shells so I was able to make several filling combos.  the chile relleno seemed overly moist and I think it may have been frozen then cooked as ordered.  I would return but probably not order the chile relleno again.  It was very busy with almost everyone getting food to go.

data.title: A hole in the wall Place with Excellent Burritos
data.text:
Muy Excelente! Super Carnitas Burrito was just so very delicious. Served with a HUGE side of great tortilla chips, and complemented by a set of fresh salsa that was terrific as well, this place is an instant favorite.

Very clean and with friendly super-duper fast service (I got my burrito just about when I sat down from getting the salsas!) the huge burrito was loaded with flavor and wonderful textures.

BTW: for the gringos or ABCs like me, the other reviews mention a "pastor" taco or other of their menu with "pastor". You won't find the word on the menu--look for BBQ Pork and that will help you out.

data.title: Best Burrito in Town
data.text: Located at 260 San Pedro Road.....I've been going to Los Metates for over ten years.  They have the best burrito in Daly City.  And the best bar of sauces too.  You can't go wrong with a plate burrito, I always order Super Beef.  With some Horchata.  Friendly staff.  Los Metates means "The Bundles" in Spanish, it means you get a lot of food and its true here.
